scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run clean && parcel build src/index.ts --out-file floorplan --no-minify
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run clean && parcel build src/index.ts --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --out-file floorplan
scripts.build:prod:no-minify: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run clean && parcel build src/index.ts --no-source-maps --no-minify --out-file floorplan
scripts.build:docs: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run clean && parcel build src/components/floorplan-projects/floorplan-projects.ts --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --out-file floorplan-projects --public-url ./ && npm run copy-static-files
